DESCRIPTION_SECTION.TITLE: Description
PARRAGRAPHS: The straight point awning represents simplicity at its finest, offering a practical and effective solution for sun protection. Designed especially for windows, small balconies, and facades, this model is perfect for keeping the interior cool and protected from glare and excessive heat.

The arms exert constant tension on the fabric, allowing it to withstand wind without deforming and offering a range of inclination angles up to 170ยบ. This ensures total vertical coverage, protecting us from the sun's rays all day long.
